thread.section_title: Renaissance Paris Republique Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Absolutely fantastic hotel. Great location, amazing staff
thread.title_full: Absolutely fantastic hotel. Great location, amazing staff - Review of Renaissance Paris Republique Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Kyle D
title: Absolutely fantastic hotel. Great location, amazing staff
text:
We are just finishing up a six night stay at this great hotel and place it as the finest Renaissance I've ever stayed at and one of the best properties in the chain.
We had a junior suite (224) which was nice but the large outdoor patio is what makes it amazing. Our kids were in a twin bedded room just down the hall which was nice but small (by American standards).
As a platinum they extend a complimentary breakfast daily since they don't have a lounge. The breakfast is terrific. Full service French with great pastries and fresh squeezed OJ.
We received especially received great service from Manon who went out of her way to accommodate us.
The hotel is new by Paris standards (about 11 months) and is clean, modern and chic.
The area is in Republique, which is not a tourist area. It is in a neighborhood with great little restaurants my favorite of which is La Bonne Cecile. Go there and tell Benedict that Kyle from Texas sent you:). He has a perfect little French bulldog share the space with him, perfect place just around the corner from the hotel.
We had a great stay and recommend this hotel without reservation.
